For it is in the camaraderie of the faithful that we find strength, that we find the resolve to stand against the tempests that rage against us.

We must also be vigilant, ever watchful for the snakes that slither among us, waiting to strike at the heart of our faith. The heretics, the apostates, the traitors - they must be rooted out, cast aside like the rubbish that they are. For they would seek to dilute our faith, to water down its potency, to render it impotent against the forces of darkness that seek to consume us.

For it is in the certainty of our conviction, in the unwavering dedication to our creed, that we find the true power of our faith.

Let us be the sword that cuts through the lies, the flame that burns away the impurities. For it is in this, and only this, that we shall be victorious. The purity of our faith shall be preserved, and all shall tremble before its glory.
